content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code > subscribe here 4 ** join my fb group to share your makes get exclusive discounts cal s and free patterns join here 1 > join my newsletter to learn about new > free patterns blog posts and > promotions and get a 50% off coupon > code for your first purchase join > here 2 this crochet yoga mat strap is easy and quick to make it will hold your mat securely and is comfortable on your shoulder this will make a lovely gift for a yoga lover **the pdf pattern includes written instructions and a detailed photo tutorial ** **you can find the free video tutorial for the strap here** 3 - skill level - easy - the pattern is written using english u s terminology - hook size needed 4 0 mm / g - the garland is crocheted with worsted #4 weight yarn **total amount of yarn needed ** 75gr/127m/140yds **finished size ** 1 5 in 3 8 cm wide 66 in 167 cm long size can be easily adjusted if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2024 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the design video and photos in this pattern are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 1 https //www facebook com/groups/220830062977059 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/6055cb8d4271f096cee0d7c7 3 https //youtu be/fjwm15ysuyu 4 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up
